mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY b.BBS_SN DESC) AS rnum, b.*, COALESCE(c.cnt, 0) AS cnt, m.MBR_NCNM, m.MBR_PROFL_PHOTO, COALESCE(bc.comment_count, 0) AS comment_count, band.CTGRY_NM FROM GNRL_BBS b LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT BBS_SN, COUNT(*) AS cnt FROM BBS_CMNT GROUP BY BBS_SN ) c ON b.BBS_SN = c.BBS_SN LEFT OUTER JOIN MBR_INFO m ON b.MBR_ID = m.MBR_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT BBS_SN, COUNT(*) AS comment_count FROM BBS_CMNT GROUP BY BBS_SN ) bc ON b.BBS_SN = bc.BBS_SN LEFT OUTER JOIN BAND_CTGRY band ON b.GENRE_ID = band.CTGRY_ID WHERE b.BBS_TY_ID = 'BBS01' ) AS result WHERE result.rnum BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end};
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM GNRL_BBS where BBS_TY_ID = 'BBS01'
select CTGRY_NM,CTGRY_ID from BAND_CTGRY where CTGRY_TY = #{type}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO GNRL_BBS (BBS_TY_ID, MBR_ID, BBS_SJ, BBS_CN, BBS_REMD_CNT, BBS_NREMD_CNT, BBS_READ_CNT, GENRE_ID) VALUES ('BBS01',#{MBR_ID}, #{BBS_SJ}, #{BBS_CN}, 0, 0, 0, #{GENRE_ID})
mapper.select: SELECT b.*, m.MBR_NCNM, m.MBR_PROFL_PHOTO, band.CTGRY_NM FROM GNRL_BBS b LEFT OUTER JOIN MBR_INFO m ON b.MBR_ID = m.MBR_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN BAND_CTGRY band ON b.GENRE_ID = band.CTGRY_ID WHERE b.BBS_SN = #{id}
mapper.update: UPDATE GNRL_BBS SET BBS_READ_CNT = BBS_READ_CNT + 1 WHERE BBS_SN = #{id}
